description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 3 part 4 storey buildings with roof extensions to provide for 136 flats. Part retention of 10 car parking spaces at basement level and provision of a (biomass) boiler in basement.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Vehicles shall only enter or exit the site in forward gear. 

REASON: To ensure that the traffic generated by the proposed development does not prejudice the free flow of traffic nor public safety along the neighbouring highway.
